Articles.Content:
So hi.

I'm currently trying to disable my joystick for motorcross madness 2, because with it, it ignores keyboard and only responds to mouse and joy.

I'm wondering how I can disable my joy without unplugging it, because somtimes it dosen't work if you unplug-replug.
umm, why not just leave it unplugged, if your trying to control with just the mouse and keyboard?

Because I DO use it for other things, like FSX or X-Plane 10. However, MM2 does not allow me to control via keyboard with it on, so I ask how-to disable joystick while still leaving it plugged in. If I unplug, It might not work when I plug it back in. 3 year old joystick

Also, it's a Logitech Attack 3.

EDIT: Found it. Device managar>HID Complimant game device.

Edited July 9, 2013 by The Destroyer
